column4: Just got back from the ol' compusa......smiling like an idiot as I passed the ROWS of anti-virus/spam and 'fix-yer-winblows' software....gawds I luvs ubuntu.  lol  ---just HAD to say that. :)
makes one wonder in an x-files sorta' conspiracy mode if its not the stupid 'fix-it' software companies generating all the breakage.  heh heh
sorry johnnybezak........you say you broke yer sound?  how?
I was reading on the ubuntu forums that it might be something to do with esd
but Ive got no idea about esd
haha fixed it thanks (im using flux hence the no speaker icon)
im not sure, but it screwed something *shakes head in shame at installing realplayer*
how can i make it use the ALSA drivers instead?
what gnome tool do i use
i can just open her from the command line
haha thanks anyway at least OSS is working
haha great minds think alike, i just reinstalled alsa
is there like a setup script or something
thanks for your help man I've tweaked the oss settings and it sounds fine
